author: wtopstaff
title: Hurricanes-Kings Sums
text:
0 2—3 
First Period_1, Los Angeles, Toffoli 5 (Ehrhoff, Lucic), 11:06 (pp). Penalties_Gaborik, LA (holding), 1:07; Jordan, Car (interference), 9:33; Lewis, LA (tripping), 11:42. 
Second Period_None. Penalties_Rask, Car (tripping), 5:56; McBain, LA (delay of game), 17:36. 
Third Period_2, Los Angeles, Kopitar 2 (Pearson), 8:04. 3, Los Angeles, Toffoli 6 (Lucic, McNabb), 17:02. Penalties_Rask, Car (embellishment), 7:58; D.Brown, LA (holding), 7:58; Pearson, LA (hooking), 12:45. 
Shots on Goal_Carolina 15-13-12_40. Los Angeles 9-9-10_28. 
Power-play opportunities_Carolina 0 of 4; Los Angeles 1 of 2. 
Goalies_Carolina, Ward 2-4-0 (28 shots-25 saves). Los Angeles, Quick 3-3-0 (40-40). 
A_18,230 (18,230). T_2:31. 
Referees_Gord Dwyer, Graham Skilliter. Linesmen_Darren Gibbs, Don Henderson. Topics:
